directions: Pour boiling water into a mug and add chai tea bags. Allow tea to steep for at least 5 minutes. Remove tea bags.
Combine lime juice and lime zest in a pitcher; add enough ice to fill pitcher halfway. Slowly pour chai tea over ice; stir. Add enough water to fill pitcher; stir in sugar.
ingredients: 3 chai tea bags, or more to taste
1/4 cup white sugar, or to taste
title: Chai Limeade
